remarks: The value of the subword extractor is the empty set (undefined) if the range is not valid.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Mar-2018.)
statement: swrdnd $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ F e. ZZ /\ L e. ZZ ) -> ( ( F < 0 \/ L <_ F \/ ( # ` W ) < L ) -> ( W substr <. F , L >. ) = (/) ) ) $.
